run(ComponentI) - Method in interface fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI.FComponentTask
a piece of code to be run as a task on the owner component.
run() - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.utils.DCVMCyclicBarrier
wait for processes for their first connection on a server socket and create a new ServiceRunnable for each of them, submitting its execution to the executor service; these threads will then synchronise with each other on a local standard cyclic barrier and alternatively wait and release their external process by exchanging messages through sockets.
run() - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.utils.DCVMCyclicBarrier.ServiceRunnable
for each external process to be synchronised, a copy of this method is the behaviour of the associated thread in the distributed cyclic barrier, which repeatedly read the external process info written on its socket, put the information in the hash table of awaiting processes and wait on the local cyclic barrier to be released; this is repeated until a null is returned from the read on socket, marking the disconnection from the barrier by the external process.
run() - Method in class fr.sorbonne_u.components.helpers.WindowOutputStream
The real work...
